mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, order_num, price, price_type, status, payment_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time, item_type, item_volume, item_weight, recipients_address, recipients_full_address, recipients_landline_number, recipients_mobile, recipients_name, remark, send_address, send_full_address, sender_landline_number, sender_mobile, sender_name, com, outlets) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{itemWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{recipientsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsFullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsLandlineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendFullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderLandlineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{com,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outlets,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
